thread.title: Etsy Faces Pressure to Abandon Irish Tax Strategy
thread.title_full: Etsy Faces Pressure to Abandon Irish Tax Strategy - WSJ

author: Suzanne Kapner
title: Etsy Faces Pressure to Abandon Irish Tax Strategy
text:
Americans for Tax Fairness, a progressive advocacy group, is pressing Etsy Inc., the online crafts marketplace, to abandon a strategy that uses an Irish subsidiary to minimize taxes it owes to Uncle Sam.
The coalition of labor unions and...
